Welcome to Taxigraph!

Taxigraph is a tool that allows you to explore and analyze tax-related data gathered from the filed financial statements of all publically traded companies that are listed on U.S. stock exchanges.

Learn more »

Visualize the data

With this extremely versatile and interactive tool you can graph and explore the relationship between any two (and up to four!) variables across different companies. Focus on particular industry codes or aggregate across desired fiscal years. Enter any company ticker to see how a given company compares with its peers.

Explore »

Reconciling differences

Firms often use various strategies and deductions to reduce their tax burden and thus end up paying different effective tax rates than the official statutory rate. Public companies must reconcile these two tax rates by disclosing the reasons for the discrepancy. This tool ranks the most significant rate reconciliation reasons.

Discover »

By the numbers

Enter any company ticker and any fiscal year and this tool will provide a fact sheet with the most relevant tax-related and other financial data we have available.

Look up »

Trending data

Interested in how tax-relevant data trends over time for a given company? With this tool you can graph and analyze these trends.

Graph »
